text:
Sorry, conspiracy theorists.

That so was Melania the other day on the South Lawn of the White House in the trench coat looking like Inspector Gadget.

Unlimited Digital Access: Only $0.99 For Your First Month Get full access to Miami Herald content across all your devices. SAVE NOW

Some Twitter users on Wednesday came up with this weird notion that the first lady, due to a very bad hair day, had hired a body double to stand next to her husband, nod and clench her jaw.

https://twitter.com/balleralert/status/920716172496011265

Trump also talked about her as if she were in another room, saying, “My wife, Melania, who happens to be right here...”

She also didn’t utter a peep.

But experts say the notion is ridiculous.

Like Joe Navarro, a body expert with the FBI:

“Her stature and facial gestures, like her slightly pursed lips and her nodding at her husband, are consistent with what we’ve seen before,” he told Vogue. “Non-verbally, there’s nothing out of the ordinary about her behavior.”

Also he blamed her sunglasses, which pinched her nose and changed her facial features slightly and hid her signature almond shaped eyes.
title: Expert: Melania Trump does not have a body double

twitter.title: The Internet is freaking out over Melania Trump’s ‘body double’
twitter.description: Melania Trump didn't look exactly like herself the other day and the Internet came up with the idea that the first lady had a body double.
